AUTH.NAME: Username
AUTH.MINLENGTH_NAME: The user name must contain at least 6 characters!
AUTH.MINLENGTH_PASSWORD: The password must be at least 8 characters long!
AUTH.PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: The password must contain uppercase letters!
AUTH.PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: The password must contain lowercase letters!
AUTH.PASSWORD_CHARACTERS: The password must contain characters: e.g., ! @ # ? ]!
